name: Dracunite
description:
Help our hero destroy Dracula's power... Dracunite!

A little platformer made for the lowrezjam. The challenge was to incorporate the game within a 64x64 pixel canvas.

Credits

Securas : art, code, sfx

Quiji : Music

Controls

Controllers are supported.
AWSD or Arrow Keys
Space/Z to jump
J/X to slash
K/C to throw your axe

The game was tested using Google Chrome. However, if it does not work for you, there is a windows 64bit executable below.
